ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Umm... easy on the mana...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... He did that to us too.  We were scheduled for Inny while another guild was scheduled for Hate, so we couldn t clear everything leading up to him.  When he
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 27 Mar 2000, Sylly Songsynger wrote:
>
> He {Innoruuk) gets to low health and trys to run...

He did that to us too. We were scheduled for Inny while
another guild was scheduled for Hate, so we couldn't clear
everything leading up to him. When he ran, we were scared
half to death that some cleric would complete heal him. Next
time I'm keeping Chain loaded...

What kind of lame god runs at the end of a fight? If I was an
inky, I'd be embarassed. :P

> Sylly Songsynger
> <The Pantheon>
> Bardette of 48 songs (Saturday - ice giants for 2 bubs; Sun more ice giants

Doh. I hit 50 this weekend.

> [Sat Mar 25 00:16:22 2000] Your target resisted the Selo`s Chords of
> Cessation spell.

Damn, you have enough guts to use AE in Hate? :)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
